form.name: Name
form.localDate: (date and time is relative to server)
form.coreSqlServer: V-Suite CORE SQL Server Name or IP
form.readAgreement: I have read and understand this message and acknowledge I wish to proceed with deletion.
form.delMsgPart1: Please select the type of deletion:
form.delMsgPart2: Job Only - Only the transfer job will be deleted. Project data (Knowledge Views, Scratch Pads, etc) that are avaiable in V-Suite Web will not be deleted.
form.delMsgPart3: Complete - Delete the transfer job and all related project data in V-Suite Web.
form.delAllMsgPart1: Deleting this transfer job will also delete project "{0}" including all its Knowledge Views, Knowledge View Notes and Scratch Pad Pages.
form.delAllMsgPart2: Are you sure you want to delete this transfer job and all "{0}" related data? You cannot undo project deletion. Please acknowledge and press "Ok" or "Cancel" to abort.

message.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this data transfer job?
message.jobSuccess: Successfully started the Data Transfer job.
message.jobInProgress: There is already a Data Transfer job in progress. Please try again later.
message.createConnectionError: Connection is not valid or has not been tested. Please check the connection parameters and test the connection.
message.connectionFailed: Connection to V-Suite CORE Failed. Please check the connection parameters and try again.
message.jobScheduleDaysError: Please select days that you would like the job to be run on.
